Class Pipeline.PipelineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.Pipeline.PipelineBuilder

    public static class Pipeline.PipelineBuilder
extends Object
    Used to built a pipeline through chained calls.

      • useClearColor

        public Pipeline.PipelineBuilder useClearColor(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector4f color)
        Builds the next action in the chain. The action sets the clear color to use when clearing color buffers.
        Parameters:
        color - The color to use for clearing buffers
        Returns:
        The builder itself, for chained calls

      • clearBuffer

        public Pipeline.PipelineBuilder clearBuffer()
        Builds the next action in the chain. The action clears the current active buffer (the bound frame buffer, or if none bound, the front (screen) buffer).
        Returns:
        The builder itself, for chained calls

      • useViewPort

        public Pipeline.PipelineBuilder useViewPort(Rectangle viewPort)
        Builds the next action in the chain. The action sets the view port to use when rendering to a buffer.
        Parameters:
        viewPort - The rendering view port
        Returns:
        The builder itself, for chained calls

        Builds the next action in the chain. The sets the blending functions.
        Returns:

      • renderModels

        public Pipeline.PipelineBuilder renderModels(Collection<? extends Model> models)
        Builds the next action in the chain. The actions renders the model list. The models will be reordered to be grouped by material. This reordering is done via a stable sort (Arrays.sort(java.lang.Object[])) so that models with the same materials are not reordered. This grouping improves performance by reducing the amount of rendering calls.
        Parameters:
        models - The models to render
        Returns:
        The builder itself, for chained calls

      • updateDisplay

        public Pipeline.PipelineBuilder updateDisplay()
        Builds the next action in the chain. The action updates the context's display.
        Returns:
        The builder itself, for chained calls

      • doAction

        public Pipeline.PipelineBuilder doAction(Action action)
        Builds the next action in the chain.
        Parameters:
        action - The action
        Returns:
        The builder itself, for chained calls

      • build

        public Pipeline build()
        Builds the pipeline, returning it.
        Returns:
